title: FIFA World Cup winner 's prize money 2018
yAxis: Prize money in million U.S. dollars
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Prize money in million U.S. dollars, containing a total of 5 data points.
In general Prize money in million U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Prize money in million U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2002_(Korea_&_Japan) to 2006_(Germany), and finally roughly constant from 2006_(Germany) to 2018_(Russia).
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2002_(Korea_&_Japan) and 2006_(Germany).
Maximum Prize money in million U.S. dollars, about 38.0 was reported at Year 2018_(Russia)
Minimum Prize money in million U.S. dollars about 7.99 was reached at Year 2002_(Korea_&_Japan)
